sn34.2:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim samadhikusalo hoti, na samadhismim thitikusalo.
sn34.2:1.5: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim thitikusalo hoti, na samadhismim samadhikusalo.
sn34.2:1.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi neva samadhismim samadhikusalo hoti, na ca samadhismim thitikusalo.
sn34.2:1.7: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco jhayi samadhismim samadhikusalo ca hoti, samadhismim thitikusalo ca.
sn34.2:1.8: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvayam jhayi samadhismim samadhikusalo ca hoti samadhismim thitikusalo ca ayam imesam catunnam jhayinam aggo ca settho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.
sn34.2:1.9: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, gava khiram, khiramha dadhi, dadhimha navanitam, navanitamha sappi, sappimha sappimando tatra aggamakkhayati;
sn34.2:1.10: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yvayam jhayi samadhismim samadhikusalo ca hoti samadhismim thitikusalo ca ayam imesam catunnam jhayinam aggo ca settho ca mokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca”ti.
